original: NORDLOF, Oscar Birger, Direktör, Stockholm, f Norrk 3/5 80 av grhdl C J N o Olivia Forssberg, gm Ebba Tjernberg. Nrkps hal. Anst i AB Aug Holts päls- & mössfabr 97—07, inneh sed. 07 o vkst dir i hatt- o mösstillbeh.-fma AB Oscar Nordlof. Styr.led i Sv hatt-, möss-fe grossistfrn samt i Sv grossistfrb. Ag fastigh Kungstensg 54, Dalag 41 o 43 samt lantst Lill-kär. Resor: Norge, Danm, Tyskl, Frankr, Engl, Span, Ital, Österr, Belg, Holl mfl. RNO, RVO, ProPstGM; medl Nat.musei vann, Kulturen, Konsthist sällsk, Sv allm konstfrn, 80 års män (styr.led), KAK, kamratfrn Vapenbröd (l:e v. ordf o frns ftjSM), Sportfiskekl, Arla Coldinu, Aurora, XV Mars, W6, östg gille, Sthlms amatörfrn, Sv filatelistfrn, Sthlms d:o mfl. Hobbies: Konst, filateli, sportfiske.
translated: NORDLOF, Oscar Birger, Director, Stockholm, born in Norrköping on May 3, 1880, son of merchant Carl Johan Nordlof and Olivia Forssberg, married to Ebba Tjernberg. Half-brother in Norrköping. Employed at AB Aug Holts fur and hat factory from 1897 to 1907, followed by ownership from 1907 and later became managing director at hat and hat accessory company AB Oscar Nordlof. Board member of Swedish hat and fur wholesalers as well as the Swedish wholesalers association. Owner of properties on Kungstensgatan 54, Dalagatan 41 and 43, and rural estate Lill-kär. Traveled to Norway, Denmark, Germany, France, England, Spain, Italy, Austria, Belgium, the Netherlands, and others. Has been awarded RNO (Order of the Polar Star), RVO (Order of Vasa), and ProPstGM (Pro Patria Gold Medal). Member of National Museum's water association, Kulturen (cultural organization), Society of Art History, Swedish General Art Association, 80 Years Men (board member), KAK (automobile club), comrades association Vapenbröd (first vice chairman and former sergeant major), Sportfishing club, Arla Coldinu, Aurora, XV Mars, W6, östg gille (regional association), Stockholm Amateur Society, Swedish Philatelic Association, Stockholm Philatelic Society, and others. Hobbies include art, philately, and sportfishing.
